welcome_benefits: Earn up to 2,500 Reward Points after the first transaction

Rewards Rate: 1 RP for every ₹100 spent on offline and online spends; 5X RP for every ₹100 spent on UPI transactions; 10X RP for every ₹100 spent on using UPI for transactions more than ₹20,000
Reward Redemption: Redeem RP through RBL Rewards Portal; 1 RP = ₹0.10

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal fee is waived if the cardholder spends ₹2 Lakh or more in the previous year.

product_details: You can earn up to 2,500 Reward Points after your first transaction and additional points for spending ₹30,000 in the first three months.
Link your National Common Mobility Card (NCMC) to use your credit limit for metro and bus travel.
